availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Steele (Louisville, Kentucky, keeper of the Louisville Hotel)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, hotel keeper. Pennsylvania native. Married to Margaret M. Andrews Steele in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on November 29, 1838. Father of Hannah Steele, Mary L. Steele, Leven S. Steele, and Fanny B. Steele. Merchant in Hamilton County, Ohio, in 1850. Keeper of the Louisville Hotel in partnership with Michael Kean and Phillip Judge in Louisville, Kentucky, from 1860 through 1865.
